column2: BRIEF-Envestnet announces pricing of convertible notes offering May 22 (Reuters) - Envestnet Inc: * ENVESTNET, INC. ANNOUNCES PRICING OF CONVERTIBLE NOTES OFFERING * HAS PRICED AN OFFERING OF $300 MILLION AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF 1.75% CONVERTIBLE NOTES DUE 2023 * NOTES WILL MATURE ON JUNE 1, 2023, UNLESS EARLIER PURCHASED, REDEEMED OR CONVERTED Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Envestnet Inc To Offer $300 Mln Of Convertible Notes May 21 (Reuters) - Envestnet Inc: * ENVESTNET, INC. TO OFFER $300 MILLION OF CONVERTIBLE NOTES * ENVESTNET INC - PROPOSES TO OFFER $300 MILLION AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF CONVERTIBLE NOTES DUE 2023 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Envestnet Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.17 May 9 (Reuters) - Envestnet Inc: * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.36 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * SEES Q2 2018 TOTAL GAAP REVENUE OF $197.0 MILLION TO $200.0 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 TOTAL GAAP REVENUE OF $811.0 MILLION TO $821.0 MILLION * SEES Q2 2018 ADJUSTED NET INCOME PER DILUTED SHARE OF $0.37 * SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED NET INCOME PER DILUTED SHARE OF $1.78-$1.83 * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.81, REVENUE VIEW $817.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.43, REVENUE VIEW $202.1 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
